summary: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.
cast: Jonah Bobo|Josh Hutcherson|Dax Shepard|Kristen Stewart|Tim Robbins|Frank Oz|John Alexander|Derek Mears|Douglas Tait|Joe Bucaro III|Jeff Wolfe|Bill Fagerbakke|Stuart Scott
keywords: playing a board game|sibling rivalry|board game|two brothers|outer space
title: Zathura: Una aventura espacial
